content.raw:
We are more than willing to help you out with this project, however we are not familiar with the mario AI competition.

I encourage you to create a fork of Gazebo, and start exploring options for integration of Mario with Gazebo.

Feel free to use this issue as a place to ask questions, and get guidance during your development process.
content.html:
We are more than willing to help you out with this project, however we are not familiar with the mario AI competition.

I encourage you to create a fork of Gazebo, and start exploring options for integration of Mario with Gazebo.

Feel free to use this issue as a place to ask questions, and get guidance during your development process.
